class_notes: This course is for CRNA students only. The course is cross-listed with NRSG 723D.
course_description: Learners focus on the fundamentals of U.S. health and social policy and the background and context they need to analyze the most pressing health and social policy challenges facing the country today. Learners will apply policy analysis tools to define and address health and social policy issues.
prerequisites: NRSG 744D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5295, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: J. Clark, Status: Closed
